patthana12.7:4.1: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:4.2: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:4.3: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu ca naahetuko nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.7:5.1: Naahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:5.2: Naahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:5.3: Naahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu ca naahetuko nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana12.7:6.1: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuñca naahetukaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:6.2: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuñca naahetukaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:6.3: Nasahetukaṃ nahetuñca naahetukaṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu ca naahetuko nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
patthana12.7:8.1: Naahetukaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana12.7:10.3: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
patthana12.7:12.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.7:12.3: naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.7:12.5: nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.7:12.7: nahetuvippayuttañceva nana ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ….
patthana12.7:13.1: Nahetuṃ nasahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … pe …
patthana12.7:14.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
